alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 16 at 5:37AM AKST until November 17 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...South winds 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph occuring. * WHERE...Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are expected in the Bering Strait. Winds will decrease slightly this afternoon and evening, but will become strong again after midnight tonight.
info.instruction: If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
